attributes.title: Bad App!!!
attributes.review: No body wants to support an orange racist and sexist sexual predator except old ppl who listen to everything they see on the news. As part of Gen Z I realize everything that is wrong with our president. Why should the Boomers get to choose anyways when gen z is the next generation. we shouldnt be out numbered by those who are going to die soon anyways... in conclusion DO NOT GET THIS APP and DONT VOTE FOR TRUMP!! listen to the younger people we understand, we are smart, and we see thing the elders dont!!! sorry not sorry but its the truth!! What if it was your daughter or sisters private that he grabbed?

attributes.title: If I could give less than 1 Star i would..
attributes.review: This app is sick!✨ Sickning🧚🏼‍♀️All I wanted was some decent information on the “Great one” who was going to make this country better INSTEAD what I found was a virus that kept spread through my phone 😤. I CONTACTED customer service and they told me the virus was only the in media. WHEN I CAN CLEARLY SEE IT. -1/10. NEXT  i was going to send a message to the Great one asking questions about our current state and It booted me out CLAIMED I WAS “FALSE NEWS” and a “BAD REPORTER.” -5/10. ✌🏼 Would not recommend 0% care for its customers *cough* i meant people.

attributes.title: scary😳
attributes.review: when i first got this app, i was so excited to be on the wrong side of history. it was so fun trying to watch the world fall apart knowing that trump and i had the same values. NEXT THING I KNOW, my house started filling up with empty cheetos bags. EMPTY. i was so confused. why were they empty? i realized that as soon as i opened the app, my house started filling up. bunker boy had eaten all of my cheetos😡😡😡😡. unacceptable😆😆😆. i was so upset. i had to clean my entire house because mr cheetos decided to eat everything. what a meanie. AND THIS APP STARTED IT. that’s why this is a 1/5. and also because trump is dumb😁😁😁.

attributes.title: umm...GROSS👁👄👁
attributes.review: first of all i hate this nasty child sex offender🤢🤢🤢 he looks like a cheeto and i mean is there really more i have to explain? So sad to see some of these blind people accidentally give this app a 5 star review 🤦🏻‍♀️ i hope you get better, maybe god will fix it, oh WAIT he’s not real🥱 i’m sorry to all the karen’s and kyles out here that had to read this review, but i hope it’ll help you make some good decisions in your life for once :) ALSO maybe do some research before you vote for the cheeto pedofile again bc be likes having sex with his children it seems like😮🤭

attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review:
Bee Movie Script - Dialogue Transcript

  
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

  
Barry, I told you,
stop flying in the house!

attributes.title: I need to join a therapy growp
attributes.review: After I downloaded the app I started having dreams of a naked, wrinkled, orange figure coming into my room and watching me sleep. These dreams quickly escalated to waking up and seeing the figure in real life.  The hideous little fellow would then proceed to tell me how saggy his little tiddies are and ask me if I would like to touch them. I refused. I know feel it’s presence with me all the time and cannot shake the feeling that it’s trying to make me donate to organizations that kill minorities. Does anyone else have this experience? See you on the flippity flip

attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever downloaded
attributes.review: this app is awful. as soon as i opened it, it gave my phone a virus. my phone would not stop showing this orange thing on the screen and it make me quite literally throw up 9 times. i still have yet to get rid of the virus, i’ve taken my phone to 23 different repair stores and none of them can seem to get rid of the virus. an app this destructive should not be available on the app store. my 3 year old sister got onto my phone and accidentally opened the app and told her she was a snowflake and that she should go back to where she came from. in addition, this app is the reason my parents got a divorce, and that is not an exaggeration. i know for a fact that my life, and so many other lives would greatly benefit if this app did not exist, so i would really appreciate it being removed from the app store.

attributes.title: Absolutely not 👁👄👁🤮
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible. There is a naked Cheeto walking around when you first open the app 🤮🤮. The app doesn’t load properly and after waiting an hour for it to load it crashed. All that happens when I tried to open it was a black screen. Then I tried to delete and re download it. It wouldn’t even download. It said Error 666: Karens are currently complaining please try again later. Absolutely unbelievable 🤦‍♀️. Disgusting trash app. Will never waste my time on anything like this again.

attributes.title: ALMoST DIED??
attributes.review: Not only did this app take 2 and a half weeks to download😡, but it also asked me for $20 as soon as it opened😨!?! Then it told me to go back to the kitchen and closed itself out🥺! I was just trying to support our lovely president bunker boy😢, and this is how I get rewarded🤬??! And just yesterday I opened the app to see if it was actually working🤔, and 3 trumpets kicked my front door down and called me a snowflake😖! So I went back into the app to see if I could donate or something to get help☹️, and it showed me a link😳! So I clicked it and my house bURST INTO FLAMES🥵! I NARROWLY ESCAPED WITH MY LIFE😱!!
